root.name: Galaxy on Fire 2
root.description: StoryGalaxy on Fire 2 is a space adventure that sees Keith T. Maxwell wake 35 years in the future and at far end of the galaxy after his ships hyperdrive malfunctions. He finds himself in the middle of a intergalactic war and pursued by a mysterious alien armada.GameplayGalaxy on Fire 2 is a space combat game that has both a story component and an open ended component where you can mine astroids, trade supplies, take on missions or work as a space pirate.Features20 planetary systems to explore100 unique space stations30 customizable space ships3 different gameplay styles170 communitiesPC System RequirementsMinimum (or Recommended)OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: Intel x86 compatible CPU with SSE 2GB RAMMemory: 2 GBHard Disk Space: 2 GBVideo Card: DirectX 9c compatible garphics card with 512 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardMinimum (or Recommended)OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7Processor: Intel x86 compatible CPU with SSE2 3GB RAMMemory: 3 GBHard Disk Space: 2 GBVideo Card: DirectX 9c compatible garphics card with more than 512 MB RAMDirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
